name: Boba Fett's Blaster Rifle (V)
Lore: 'Sawed off BlasTech EE-3 blaster rifle. Although its barrel is a few centimeters under the legal limit, no one has lived to file an official complaint.',
Text: 'Deploy on non-[Maintenance] Boba Fett. During your turn, opponent''s characters here may not use landspeed. While a captive at same site, your Force drains are +1 here. May target a character for free. Draw destiny. Target captured if destiny +2 > defense value.',
